summary: A group of British criminals plans the robbery of the Royal Mail train on the Glasgow-London route.
cast: Stanley Baker|Joanna Pettet|James Booth|Frank Finlay|Barry Foster|William Marlowe|Clinton Greyn|George Sewell|Glynn Edwards|Michael McStay|Martin Wyldeck|Rachel Herbert|Patrick Jordan|Barry Stanton|Kenneth Farrington|Robert Russell|Roger Booth|Ron Charles|Billy Cornelius|Michael David|Ivor Dean|Julie Ege|Hugh Elton|Charles Gilliard|Roy Hanlon|David King|Carlos Lagrotta|Tommy Little|Joe Lynch|Linda Marlowe|Tony O'Leary|David Pinner|Terence Plummer|Robert Powell|Mike Pratt|Carl Rigg|John Savident|Esme Smythe|Guy Standeven|Margaret Stuart|Anthony Sweeney|Malcolm Taylor|Joseph Tregonino|Mickey Varey|Joe Wadham|Frank Williams|Fred Wood
title: El gran robo
